com.google.android.glass.TMM

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.glass.TMM.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Class Server. This class is designed to contain information about the source of a card, which is assumed to be a server somewhere.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

              java.lang.String aPI_info,
              long first_used,
              long last_used)
        Instantiates a new server object.
        Parameters:
        name - The server's name.
        aPI_info - The API information for this server if such information exists.
        first_used - The UNIX time that the server was first used.
        last_used - The UNIX time that the server was last used.
